mapper.sql: a.id, a.crash_log AS `crashLog` a.action_date AS `actionDate` a.operator, a.network, a.platform, a.version, a.uid, a.creation_date AS `creationDate`
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO stat_crash_log ( id, crash_log, action_date,
operator,
network,
platform, version, uid, creation_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{crashLog}, #{actionDate},
#{operator},
#{network},
#{platform}, #{version}, #{uid}, #{creationDate} )
